pages.text: $(o)Wolves and Ocelots are not the only vanilla creatures you can tame!

pages.title: BAT TAMING
pages.text: $(o)Feed a bat some Pumpkin Pie. If successfull, the bat will pop into your inventory! Use the 'bat item' to send out your bat, and you'll get a Bat Flute to recall it. $(br2)It will also pop back into your inventory when in danger, as long as your Bat Flute is in your inventory.

$(o)Your bat levels by fighting mobs. It can level up, get stronger, and even train in different classes! $(br2)A bat's class is determined by the equipment you can give it, special bat gear it wears.
